sentences.english: Tracks are not compatible with LEGO 9V trains.
sentences.chinese: 曲目与乐高不兼容9V的列车。
接下来是一盘10支曲目的专辑《祖罗帕》。

sentences.english: The Holy Box was released the same year by Lucretia Records including exclusive acoustic tracks.
sentences.chinese: 圣盒被释放，同年由卢克记录包括独家声曲目。

sentences.english: As soon as the crowd starts to fidget change the music.
sentences.chinese: 一旦人群开始出现厌烦情绪，就改变曲目。

sentences.english: Currently there is information on about a million tracks.
sentences.chinese: 目前大约有一百万条曲目的信息。

sentences.english: Save tracklist column positions and relative width
sentences.chinese: 保存专辑曲目列的位置和相对宽度。

sentences.english: Write the selected music and ignition control programs into the igniter.
sentences.chinese: 将选定的曲目的音乐及点火控制程序写入点火器中。

sentences.english: The first large-scale original pieces of modern music, Blue-ray Water drum.
sentences.chinese: 大型首创原创现代鼓乐曲目《风尚男子蓝光鼓》。

sentences.english: The compositions were appropriate for the large reverberant cathedrals under construction.
sentences.chinese: 创作的曲目与正在建设的混响大的教堂相吻合。

sentences.english: Gradual increase of the volume at the start of an audio track.
sentences.chinese: 从曲目的起点处开始逐渐增大音量。

sentences.english: Are you looking forward to the new OST track by DBSK?
sentences.chinese: 你是否期待着由东方神起新的OST曲目？

sentences.english: Besides, it's made up of interlocking musical sequences.
sentences.chinese: 再说，整部电影都是由环环相扣的音乐曲目组成。

sentences.english: Cambalache is the name of a Tango song in Argentina.
sentences.chinese: Cambalache是阿根廷一首探戈曲目的名字。

sentences.english: The crew members pick the playlist, along with friends and family.
sentences.chinese: 船员们和他们的家人朋友们一起挑选了这些曲目。

sentences.english: Guessing track numbers is also quite simple.
sentences.chinese: 猜测曲目数量也使相当简单的。

sentences.english: The original opera is considered a masterpiece of classical Chinese theater.
sentences.chinese: 原作《牡丹亭》被视为中国经典曲目的代表之作。

definition: to perform on a musical instrument
sung performance/to sing for an audience
musical ensemble of several instruments (e.g. duet 二重奏 or trio 三重奏)
